title: The Great Gatsby
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
description: The story of the mysteriously wealthy Jay Gatsby and his love for the beautiful Daisy Buchanan.

title: To Kill a Mockingbird
author: Harper Lee
description: The story of young Scout Finch and her father, lawyer Atticus Finch, as they navigate the racial tensions of their small Alabama town.

title: Pride and Prejudice
author: Jane Austen
description: The classic tale of the lively and opinionated Elizabeth Bennet and her romance with the wealthy Mr. Darcy.

author: George Orwell
description: The story of Winston Smith, a man living in a totalitarian society, and his struggle to preserve his humanity and individuality.

title: The Catcher in the Rye
author: J.D. Salinger
description: The story of Holden Caulfield, a teenage boy grappling with his identity and place in the world.
